tools

Class SampleHelper

  • java.lang.Object
    • tools.SampleHelper

  • public class SampleHelper
extends java.lang.Object
    An utility class to process training samples. 一个处理培训样本的工具类。

    • Nested Class Summary

      Nested Classes 
      Modifier and Type Class and Description
      static interface  SampleHelper.ImgProcessor
      Must implements public BufferedImage process(BufferedImage img);
      Usage: just like FilenameFilter
       必须实现public BufferedImage process(BufferedImage img);
      用法：就像FilenameFilter一样

      static void extendSamples(java.lang.String directoryPath)
      Extends the number of examples by random cropping.
      crop portion is specified by TFUtils.cropRate
      new images saved in the same dir but with new names starting with "ext-"
      Note: not recursive
       通过随机裁剪来扩展样本的数量 裁剪部分由TFUtils.cropRate

    • Method Detail

      • extendSamples

        public static void extendSamples(java.lang.String directoryPath)
        Extends the number of examples by random cropping.
        crop portion is specified by TFUtils.cropRate
        new images saved in the same dir but with new names starting with "ext-"
        Note: not recursive
         通过随机裁剪来扩展样本的数量 裁剪部分由TFUtils.cropRate
        指定 新图像保存在同一个目录中，但以“ext-”开头的新名称
        注意：没有递归
        Parameters:
        directoryPath - 样本目录，只有该目录下文件会被扩充 Sample directory, only the files in the directory will be extended

      • batchEditImages

        public static void batchEditImages(java.lang.String inputDir,
                                   java.lang.String outputDir,
                                   java.lang.String prefix,
                                   SampleHelper.ImgProcessor processor)
        Copy the entire structure of inputDir to outputDir/inputDirName with images processed by a processor inside.
        Note:recursive         将inputDir的整个结构复制到outputDir / inputDirName 由处理器内部处理的图像。
        注意：递归
        Parameters:
        inputDir -
        outputDir -
        prefix - 用"prefix"+randInt重命名文件 rename images with "prefix"+randInt
        processor - outputImg = processor.process(inputImg);

      • scaleImageDir

        public static void scaleImageDir(java.lang.String inputDir,
                                 java.lang.String outputDir,
                                 int maxSize)
        Copy dir structure and images in inputDir, and output resized images to outputDir/inputDirname/ in corresponding structure.
        Rename images with "scale-"+randInt
        Note:recursive
         复制dir结构和图像在inputDir中， 并在相应的结构中输出调整大小的图像到outputDir/inputDirname/。 用"scale - "+ randInt
        重命名图像 注意：递归
        Parameters:
        inputDir -
        outputDir -
        maxSize - 输出图像的最大尺寸， 图像的所有边都小于或等于maxSize max size of the output image, whose all sides are less than or equal to maxSize

      • deleteEmptyDirs

        public static void deleteEmptyDirs(java.io.File dir)
        Note:recursive 注意:递归
        Parameters:
        dir -

      • checkDimensionsRec

        public static void checkDimensionsRec(java.io.File rootDir,
                                      int minW,
                                      int minH,
                                      int maxW,
                                      int maxH,
                                      java.util.ArrayList<java.lang.String> divs,
                                      java.lang.String outputDir)
        Print paths to images that does not meet any of the requirements Note:recursive 打印不符合任何要求的图像路径 注意：递归
        Parameters:
        rootDir - 检查的文件夹div to be checked
        minW -
        minH -
        maxW - 如果maxW<=0, 无视它If maxW<=0, it is ignored
        maxH - 如果maxH<=0, 无视它If maxH<=0, it is ignored
        divs - 如果不为null，则存储不合格图像的原始路径 if not null, original paths to the unqualified images are stored there
        outputDir - 如果不为null，则不合格的图像被移动到该目录 if not null, unqualified images are moved to this dir

      • generateTrainAndEvalSets

        public static void generateTrainAndEvalSets(java.lang.String rootPath,
                                            double percentForEval)
        Generate randomly selected files for training and evaluation from a processed dataset Note:recursive 从处理过的数据集生成随机选择的训练和评估文件 注意：递归
        Parameters:
        rootPath - 在根目录下创建文件夹"train"和"eval" 将根目录的结构保留在这些新的目录下。 Create folders "train" and "eval" under the root dir and Keep the structure of the root dir inside these new dirs.
        percentForEval - 以percentForEval/1的概率， 根目录中的文件被复制到eval目录中，其余的将被复制到train目录中. With a probability of percentForEval/1, files in the root dir are copied to the eval dir, the rest are copied to the train dir.

        public static void main(java.lang.String[] args)
        Test 测试
        Parameters:
        args -
